keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Chief Justice Roy S. Moore cited a pending State Supreme Court case in issuing an edict that goes against the United States Supreme Court’s decision.

headline.print_headline: Alabama Judge Orders a Halt to Gay Marriages
headline.main: Top Alabama Judge Orders Halt to Same-Sex Marriage Licenses

snippet: Chief Justice Roy S. Moore cited a pending State Supreme Court case in issuing an edict that goes against the United States Supreme Court’s decision.
abstract: Alabama Supreme Court Justice Roy S Moore orders probate judges not to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples, citing State Supreme Court decision upholding state's marriage prohibitions and conflicting with United States Supreme Court ruling; instruction marks second time Moore has used administrative order to block same-sex marriage.
